section.heading: Determination of voting power of patron member.

para.text: The organic rules may allocate voting power among patron members on the basis of one or a combination of the following:
If a patron member is a cooperative, the number of its patron members.
The organic rules may provide for the allocation of patron member voting power by districts or class, or any combination thereof.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 512 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
